title: Syncora
description: Music streaming platform for artists to upload and for listeners to listen.

detailed.overview: Music streaming platform focused on independent artists. Users can upload tracks, build playlists, follow artists, and join conversations around songs and samples. Built with React + TypeScript on Bun/Hono, Supabase for auth/storage/security, and a mobile UI.
detailed.motivation: I wanted a cleaner, community centered alternative to mainstream platforms. Something that highlights underground artists, sample culture, and thoughtful discovery without all of the algorithms
features: Playlists, likes, reposts, and follows with UI updates
Community reviews and ratings with user profiles and activity feeds
Role-based permissions and Supabase RLS for secure multi-tenant data

title: Baller Props
description: Sports data research tool using prop lines from online sportsbooks.

detailed.overview: A sports betting research tool for NBA and WNBA prop lines. Aggregates data from multiple sportsbooks and provides statistical analysis to streamline research that would otherwise require lots of browser tabs.
detailed.motivation: Researching sports props required manually comparing data across multiple sportsbooks and ESPN, leading to a ton of open tabs and no way to track stats efficiently. Existing tools were overpriced for occasional betting, so I built a streamlined alternative focused on data aggregation and easy comparison.
features: Scrapes prop lines from PrizePicks, Underdog, and DraftKings
Sortable and filterable tables for quick prop discovery
Statistical analysis including L10 averages, hit rate percentages, and head to head data
Compare odds across sportsbooks to find the best lines
Historical season data dating back to 2023
Custom backend using FastAPI and a forked nba_api library for extended data coverage

title: Convenient Convert
description: File conversion tool for audio, images, documents, and video.

detailed.overview: File conversion web app with multiple converting options with a simple drag and drop UX. Converts audio, image, document, and video formats quickly.
detailed.motivation: Most online converters are spammy or limit formats. I wanted a clean and trustworthy tool I could share with friends that just works fast and private
features: Batch uploads with background queue and progress tracking

title: Syncora Waitlist
description: Landing + waitlist for Syncora with verified email capture to sign up.

detailed.overview: A site for future users to sign up with their email for be notified for release day of Syncora.
detailed.motivation: I wanted a waitlist with security and analytics so I could collect information to notify users for the release date of Syncora.
features: Admin dashboard: signups over time, conversion, and sources
Responsive Tailwind UI, dark/light theming, and fast TTFB
Multiple languages supported (English, Spanish, Japanese, etc.)

title: Facial Controller for Gaming
description: Controller for Disabled People to play video games using face movements
